title: Fragment
description: Fragment of bowl.  Grwyish porcellanous body covered on outer side with pale green crackled glaze, the crackle brown.  Inner side paper thin white glaze, opaque and faintly crackled.  One of 22 fragments of Kuan)Imperial) ware found at Black Turtle Hill.  See note 36.10.1
creditline: Gift of C.T. Loo, New York
